select oi.id, oi.code, oi.user_id, oi.merchant_id, oi.order_price, oi.after_order_price, oi.discount, oi.integral, oi.status, oi.`type`, oi.kilometre, oi.distribution_price, oi.create_date, oi.pay_date, oi.service_date, oi.address_id, oi.staff_id, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, mi.name as merchantName, mi.images as merchantImages, ei.id as evaluateId from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = oi.merchant_id) left join evaluate_info ei on (ei.order_id = oi.id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.userId}
AND mi.user_id = #{orderInfo.merchantId}
order by oi.create_date desc
select sum(oii.amount) as count, di.name from order_item_info oii left join dishes_info di on (di.id = oii.dishes_id) where 1 = 1 group by oii.dishes_id
